choose:
(:action choose_plant
    :parameters (?p - player ?f - fir ?n - nursery)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?n) (at ?f ?n))
    :effect (and (inventory ?p ?f) (not (at ?f ?n)))
)

(:action choose_soil
    :parameters (?p - player ?s - soil ?g - garden_center)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?g) (at ?s ?g))
    :effect (and (inventory ?p ?s) (not (at ?s ?g)))
)

(:action select_container
    :parameters (?p - player ?c - container ?g - garden_center)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?g) (at ?c ?g))
    :effect (and (inventory ?p ?c) (not (at ?c ?g)))
)
re:
(:action re_pot
    :parameters (?p - player ?f - fir ?c1 - container ?c2 - container)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?c1) (at ?f ?c1) (established ?f ?c1) (inventory ?p ?c2))
    :effect (and (not (at ?f ?c1)) (not (established ?f ?c1)) (at ?f ?c2) (established ?f ?c2))
)
```

These actions represent the steps required to grow a Dwarf Balsam Fir, including choosing the plant, selecting a container, choosing soil, planting the fir, establishing the plant, and repotting it when necessary.
